name: Trio Adventures
description: In a space travel, a accident makes Billy D. and your friends fall into this obcure planet. Now the adventures starts and only you can save tham.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.4 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 series or higher Storage: 1 GB available space
